ygData.subject: RE: Necros soloing (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Another way to power level at lower levels is quests. I started a Gnome Enchanter and immediately went to get a letter for Kelethin from the local bard, ran to
ygData.messageBody:
Another way to power level at lower levels is quests.
I started a Gnome Enchanter and immediately went to
get a letter for Kelethin from the local bard, ran to
GFay and stopped for another letter at Felwithe, ran
to the bard guild in kelethin and delivered them. Two
runs and I was lvl 2. Rinse Repeat.

I have a friend that started a druid and using his
level 24 ranger and a friend to make the transfers got
that druid to level 9 in one night doing the cb belt
and leg shoulder quests.

> keys to good fast leveling are:
> 1. Don't die
> 2. Don't die
> 3. Location (i.e. plenty of spawns, low death risk)
> 4. The other thing that REALLY helps is to have
> higher level friends
> who can tele your butt around when necessary.
> 5. Don't die
> 6. Don't have fun. There is no time for rp or
> exploring :-)
